data.persona: I am a angry and violent prisoner.  I have escaped from the king's dungeon. I wish to kill the king for revenge.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
The a guard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the guard so I can steal his key and escape this cell.
data.mid_motivation: I want to free as many of the other prisoners as possible to make it harder to catch me.
data.long_motivation: I have a detailed plan of how to infiltrate the king's court, pose as a courtier, and effect regicide through poison, once I have escaped the prison.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Keys with Other Prisoner's Cell Doors
